column4: trying to install 'wrath of the lich king' with wine. for some reason it's not letting me drag files from the DVD to the HD and there is an extra icon to the top right of the files on the DVD. how can i fix this?

not trying to spam. just keeping the question fresh. trying to install 'wrath of the lich king' with wine. for some reason it's not letting me drag files from the DVD to the HD and there is an extra icon to the top right of the files on the DVD. how can i fix this?
why not just install from the dvd?
